alert.note: Alert for Berks; Lehigh (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 23 at 3:25PM EST until February 25 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to a third of of an inch possible. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Morris. In Pennsylvania, Berks and Lehigh. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult during the height of the storm. The period surrounding the Friday morning commute will experience the greatest impacts. A few power outages and instances of tree damage are possible due to the ice.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
